name: Quantum Machine Learning
description: A project focused on applying quantum algorithms to machine learning tasks, exploring the potential for speedup and new computational paradigms.

name: Quantum Communication Networks
description: Building a simulation of a quantum network to understand the challenges and opportunities of secure quantum communication.

name: Superconducting Qubit Simulation
description: A past project that successfully modeled the behavior of a superconducting qubit using classical simulation tools.

name: Entanglement Visualization Tool
description: A front-end project to create an interactive tool for visualizing quantum entanglement in a simple, intuitive way.
